typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SOURCE_CODE_KEY as string,
		SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		TARGET_CODE as string,
		TARGET_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CODE_TYPE as string,
		CODE_TYPE_ID as double,
		CODE2 as string,
		OM_X_REF as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> tCrossReference
tCrossReference filter(CODE_TYPE_ID == 113) ~> filterAgreementType113
filterAgreementType113 aggregate(groupBy(TARGET_CODE),
	TARGET_DESCRIPTION = first(TARGET_DESCRIPTION)) ~> deduplicator
deduplicator select(mapColumn(
		agt_description = TARGET_DESCRIPTION,
		agt_key = TARGET_CODE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameOutputColumn
renameOutputColumn derive(last_updated_by = 'pre_dim_agreement_type') ~> addLastUpdatedBy
addLastUpdatedBy select(mapColumn(
		agt_description,
		agt_key,
		last_updated_by
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> selectOutputForUpdate
selectOutputForUpdate alterRow(upsertIf(!isNull(agt_description))) ~> alterrow
alterrow sink(input(
		PK_KEY as string,
		CPT_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CPT_NUMBER as integer,
		INSERTED_BY as string,
		DATE_INSERTED as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['pre_dim_agreement_type.parquet'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> preDimAgreementTypeUpdate
